messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2773
messages.msgSnippet: ... There s only 3 of us, and I often cook for a crowd.  I just figure cooking extra means half the work.  The next meal comes out of the fridge or freezer,
messages.messageBody:
12/28/02 12:48:

> Peggy, who still has a hard time remembering to only cook enough food for a
> family of four, not eight.
>
There's only 3 of us, and I often cook for a crowd. I just figure cooking
extra means half the work. The next meal comes out of the fridge or
freezer, into the microwave and on the table in under 5 minutes!

brenda, the lazy....
(who cooked an entire turkey for the holidays, for 2. I'll be eating turkey
on the 4th of July and loving it!)
